description: Predict inner_epidermis layer-specific DE from global skin (all_skin) DE features. Frontier task: only 11 positive genes out of 18,677 — tests whether any method can extract signal at this extreme imbalance.

input_spec.features: 3 features from all_skin DESeq2: baseMean, log2FoldChange, lfcSE
input_spec.note: stat and pval excluded to avoid trivial leakage

notes: Frontier task: ~2 test positives per 80/20 split — metric stability is low
Performance above random baseline would be scientifically informative
Report AUROC alongside AUPRC for more stable comparison
